Class Login

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • Login
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class Login
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    This program creates a login algorithm that encrypts and saves user account information.
    Version:
    4.0, June 7, 2014
    Author:
    Wendy Fu and Lucy Liu
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Login

        public Login()
        The Login constructor sets the layout of the panel and outputs the images and sets them on the panel. The mouse listener is added to the buttons created.
        Parameters:
        layout - creates a new reference to the SpringLayout class.

      • encrypt

        public static java.lang.String encrypt(java.lang.String pass)
        This method returns the encrypted password.
        Parameters:
        key - creates a new String.
        md5 - creates a new instance of the MessageDigest class.
        bytes - creates a new 2D byte array.
        string - creates a new instance of StringBuilder class.

      • isValid

        public static boolean isValid(java.lang.String u,
                              java.lang.String p)
        This method checks if the user input is valid.
        Parameters:
        f - creates a new instance of the File class.
        in - creates a new instance of the FileInputStream class.
        output - creates a new String.
        c - creates a new integer.
        vals - creates a new 2D String array.
        fu - creates a new String.
        fp - creates a new String.

      • newUser

        public static boolean newUser(java.lang.String u,
                              java.lang.String p)
        This method creates a new user in the record and stores the info in a subfolder.
        Parameters:
        f - creates a instance of the File class.
        out - creates a new instance of the FileOutputStream class.
        o - creates a new String.

      • replaceUser

        public static boolean replaceUser(java.lang.String u,
                                  java.lang.String p)
        This method replaces the data of an existing user in the record and stores the info in a subfolder.
        Parameters:
        f - creates a instance of the File class.
        out - creates a new instance of the FileOutputStream class.
        o - creates a new String.
